item.description:
The Venue for this MeetUp has changed!!

I am afraid there is a slight change in plans for this brunch. It will now be held at Tides Restaurant and Bar. I have also changed the time to 15 minutes later. I'm sorry if this causes any inconvenience in attending this one.. Please update accordingly..

Public Transportation Directions: Take the Green or Orange Line to Haymarket T station, transfer to No. 400, 440, 441, or 442 bus to Central Square in Lynn, transfer to No. 439 bus to the rotary near the boathouse. Or take the Blue Line to Wonderland, transfer to No. 441 or 442 (Marblehead) bus to Central Square in Lynn, transfer to No. 439 bus to rotary near the boathouse.

Car Directions: http://www.bwrfc.org/...

If you are not able to come to this one and are interested in these discussions, I would love to hear your thoughts for the next one.

Summary
There's something going on in the country right now. Many more people are engaged in the presidential election than in decades. People say this is the most interesting and engaged election they've experienced in their lifetime. At the same time, more and more of the American people nationally, 35-40% are calling themselves "independent." Here in MASS 49% of our voters are registered independent. And now, independents are getting organized!

Obama and McCain both have the appeal of the Independently minded voter..

A recent poll of Massachusetts shows that in a head to head matchup, Senator McCain and Senator Obama are tied.Do you agree?

We are looking to do these casual conversations every month. So, if you can't make this one, please let me know if you would be opened to another one.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the Private room! My cell is 617 429-9168
item.why: Independent's are having a big impact on the presidential elections. Join us to

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: Let's Talk Independently: at a near the Beach Brunch
